message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $12,000 is significantly less than what I had in mind.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000? It's a fantastic product, and I believe it will exceed your expectations.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $13,000?
